rows.label: tev071391_MSG0001
rows.name: Excuse me, but may I ask you a question?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0002
rows.name:
We're using purified water from the Biahno water-
purification plant to mass-produce senirapa water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0003
rows.name:
But we don't really know anything about the people
who run that installation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0004
rows.name:
I would like to give a token of our gratitude to its
employees, but I don't know who I should present it to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0005
rows.name:
If it wouldn't be too much trouble—and if you happen
to be acquainted with the staff there—could you direct
me to an appropriate representative?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_JNK0010
rows.name: Suggest Rosie[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_SEL0011
rows.name: Direct Kon'luarb to Rosie, the plant administrator.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_JNK0020
rows.name: Suggest Ajoa[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_SEL0021
rows.name: Direct Kon'luarb to Ajoa, the plant's creator.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0006
rows.name:
I see. So it is Rosie we have to thank for our ability to
produce senirapa water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0007
rows.name: Hmm. The plant is located in a dangerous area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0008
rows.name:
I imagine this Rosie could put a large shipment of
Orphean Technologies' fine arms and armaments to
good use.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0009
rows.name:
Reciprocity is one of the fundamental principles of
alliance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0010
rows.name:
And with this, a favor received shall be a favor repaid.
I thank you for your guidance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0011
rows.name:
What an incredible deed this Ajoa has achieved!
Where might I find her?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0012
rows.name:
...What? She was attacked by indigens and is presently
hospitalized at the Mimeosome Maintenance Center?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0013
rows.name:
Then I shall prepare a gift of mimeosome parts to
ensure her speedy recovery![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0014
rows.name:
Reciprocity is one of the fundamental principles of
alliance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0015
rows.name:
And with this, a favor received shall be a favor repaid.
I thank you for your guidance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0016
rows.name:
What an incredible deed this Ajoa has achieved!
Where might I find her?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0017
rows.name: ...What? She perished in an indigen attack?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0018
rows.name: I see. Well, it may not be possible to repay the dead...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0019
rows.name:
But at the very least, I can pay tribute to her great
accomplishment by producing more senirapa water
so that we Orphe can engage in further reproduction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev071391_MSG0020
rows.name:
And through our shared Ovah, I will pass on the
knowledge of her magnanimous deed to all of my
offspring.[ST:wait ]
